item.source: ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos

item.title: As Gaza ceasefire hinges on returning remains, Waltz says U.S. to help find the missing, including Americans - CBS News
item.description: As Gaza ceasefire hinges on returning remains, Waltz says U.S. to help find the missing, including Americans  CBS NewsView Full Coverage on Google News

item.title: Taiwan bans officials attending Chinese events to mark island's 'retrocession' - Reuters
item.description:
1. Taiwan bans officials attending Chinese events to mark island's 'retrocession'  Reuters
  2. Council issues warnings ahead of holiday  Taipei Times
  3. Taiwanese warned against attending Chinese events to mark Retrocession Day  Taiwan News
  4. Taiwan bars officials and students from China’s ‘retrocession’ events  The Independent
  5. The Mainland Affairs Council banned public officials from traveling to mainland China to attend the 80th anniversary of Taiwan's recovery and urged the public not to fall prey to united front work.  VOCO News
